short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize the font and background color of the Console in Chrome Devtools.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Includes background-color support to match the following popular themes following themes, in both light and dark variants:
- Alabaster
- Solarized
- Zenburn
- Degas
- Monokai
- Neutral

Detailed usage instructions can be found here:
https://github.com/paintparty/devtools-console-customizer
